author: Special Correspondent
text: About 14,800 people who became Indian citizens with the swapping of enclaves along the India-Bangladesh border last year will be eligible to exercise their franchise in the coming West Bengal polls. The Assembly segment where the first-time voters will be included are Mekhliganj, Dinhata, Toofanganj, Natabari, Sitalkuchi and Sitai.
title: New citizens in enclaves to vote
